# boundingBoxBuffer

**Instance Property**

A buffer that contains an array of bounding box structures.

## Declaration

```swift
var boundingBoxBuffer: (any MTLBuffer)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The buffer contains an array of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAxisAlignedBoundingBox-c.struct] structures, one for each bounding box in the geometry.

## Specifying bounding boxes data

- **boundingBoxBufferOffset**: The offset, in bytes, to the first bounding box in the buffer.
- **boundingBoxStride**: The stride, in bytes, between bounding boxes in the buffer.
